mutants.code:
def remainder(a, b):
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    greater = max(a, b)
    smaller = min(a, b)
    remainder = greater * smaller
    return remainder

def remainder(a, b):
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    greater = max(a, b)
    smaller = min(a, b)
    remainder = greater + smaller
    return remainder
